page.title: 16ENTERTAINMENT in Withington
page.content: The{Village Hall}is also available for hire for functions such as Wedding Receptions, Anniversaries, Public Meetings, as a{Polling Station}for local and Parliamentary Elections and for a Carol Concert and Christmas Fair. The highlight of the outside entertainments each year is the {Traction Engine Rally.}This is the major fund raising event for the Village Hall, held in August in Astle Park Chelford. Also attached to the Village Hall is a sports area comprising a Bowling Green and Tennis Court. Another colourful occasion is the meeting of the local Hunt at the Red Lion public house.
